body.name: Pirate Battery YTX5L-BS Maintenance Free Replacement Battery compatible with ATV, Motorcycle, and Scooter: 12 Volts, 5 Amps, 4Ah, Nut and Bolt (T3) Terminal
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 12 hrs 17 mins
features: BATTERY TYPE: YTX5L-BS Absorbent Glass Mat battery is rechargeable AGM battery fits in a variety of applications.

TOP TECHNOLOGY: The Acid inside is constructed with Absorbed Glass Mat technology allowing for a low-maintenance and spill proof battery. Patented sealed post prevents corrosion, which gives extended battery life.
EASY APPLICATION: Pirate Batteries come fully charged and ready to go once delivered. Simply connect your battery to the application and you are ready to go.
PRECISE VOLTAGE REGULATION: Pirate batteries maintain precise voltage levels, ensuring consistent and stable power delivery for your devices.
UNBEATABLE WARRANTY: Top notch customer service from real battery experts! Guaranteed 12 Months warranty with 45-day refund policy. Fast 2-3 day shipping.
body.description: Pirate unveils the YTX5L-BS sealed AGM batteries, tailored for adventurers who are also seeking cost-effective results. Each battery is equipped with lead calcium alloy and absorbed glass mat AGM technology, which allows a complete maintenance-free and high-performance operation. You can embrace a better warranty and an enhanced returns policy compared to our other brand; Zipp, ensuring durable performance at a reasonable price. Fiberglass mat separators and high cell compression extend battery life by providing superior vibration resistance from the most extreme conditions. All YTX5L-BS Pirate Battery brand AGM batteries are rigorously tested to ensure safety, OEM compatibility, effectiveness, and optimal performance.YTX5L-BS is a 12V 65CCA High Performance Sealed AGM BatteryYTX5L-BS has AGM Separators for superior design and durability.YTX5L-BS Battery Features:Patented sealed post prevents corrosion which gives extended battery life. No spills, no leaks, and no water to check. Extreme vibration resistance to ensure maximum conductivity. High Cranking Amps & Low Self-Discharge Rate. Ready for immediate use. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Good quality battery as described. No complaints

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I will purchase this every time I need a new battery cause it’s exactly as described

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Longevity is unknown

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 9, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great battery for the price
reviews.reviewText: This battery was $30 bucks shipped after tax. You can’t beat that value. My battery was packaged well and didn’t have any damaged. The pamphlet states if the battery was sitting for months that it may need to be recharged. I don’t get why everybody is getting upset just trickle charge it. I pulled the voltage first and it was strong reading 13 volts and my scooter fired right up very strong. The only complaint I have is the terminal screws being so short. If they’re were a few mm longer this wouldn’t be an issue. I had to hold up the stud with a screwdriver to have the screw thread into it. My terminals are not thick at all. A longer screw would make this battery 5 stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Fit right in the slot and powered a Sportsman 90 to run like it should.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Didn’t even last a month.
reviews.reviewText: We bought the battery and our daughter was able to ride it here and there. But it won’t charge and won’t stay charged. Hasn’t even been a full month of using it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great price and good quality
reviews.reviewText: This battery has been working great in my grandsons quad

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I sent this battery to my nephew for his 2 daughters 50cc polaris outlaw 4 wheeler. I was a little worried because the price was so low ( less than 1/4 of the dealers price ) that it may not work. He installed it and sent me a picture of the 2 of them flying around the yard having a blast. The battery is working great. I won't have any hesitation to order another battery from this company.
